languages.text: "Если ты, сраженная, еще будешь способна говорить, я повторю свой вопрос. Ты заслужила право упокоиться достойно".
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
languages.original_text: "Если ты, сраженная, еще будешь способна говорить, я повторю свой вопрос. Ты заслужила право упокоиться достойно".

traits.locale_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
"If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

languages.text: «Si todavía es capaz de hablar tras su derrota, le repetiré mi pregunta. Se merece un descanso honorable».
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

traits.locale_text: «Si todavía es capaz de hablar tras su derrota, le repetiré mi pregunta. Se merece un descanso honorable».

languages.text: 「敗戦後、まだ話せるというのなら、もう一度質問しましょう。名誉ある休息を得られたのですから」
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

traits.locale_text: 「敗戦後、まだ話せるというのなら、もう一度質問しましょう。名誉ある休息を得られたのですから」

languages.text: “如果你被打败之后还能开口的话，我届时会重复我的问题。你已经赢得了光荣的安息。”
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

traits.locale_text: “如果你被打败之后还能开口的话，我届时会重复我的问题。你已经赢得了光荣的安息。”

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr nach Eurer Niederlage noch sprechen könnt, werde ich meine Frage wiederholen. Ihr habt eine ehrenhafte letzte Ruhe verdient."
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr nach Eurer Niederlage noch sprechen könnt, werde ich meine Frage wiederholen. Ihr habt eine ehrenhafte letzte Ruhe verdient."

languages.text: « Si vous êtes encore capable de parler après votre défaite, je vous poserai à nouveau la question. Vous méritez de reposer avec les honneurs. »
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous êtes encore capable de parler après votre défaite, je vous poserai à nouveau la question. Vous méritez de reposer avec les honneurs. »

languages.text: "Yenilginin ardından hâlâ konuşabilecek durumda olursan sorumu tekrarlarım. Şerefli bir şekilde ölmeyi hak ettin."
languages.original_text: "If you are still able to speak after your defeat, I will repeat my question then. You have earned an honourable rest."
